dct_title_s: Maharashtra : reduced from a map of 6 inches to a degree
dct_description_sm: Cartographic Details: Scale approximately 1:1,675,000. Relief shown pictorially. From: Grant Duff's History of the Mahrattas. London : Longman, Rees, Orme, Browne & Green, Paternoster Row, 1826.1 map (volume 2, page 1).
Ames Library of South Asia Maps
